hadith.chapter: The Book Pertaining to the Excellent Qualities of the Holy Prophet (may Peace be upon them) and His - كتاب الفضائل
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثناه عثمان بن أبي شيبة، وإسحاق بن إبراهيم، عن جرير، عن الأعمش، بهذا الإسناد ‏.‏ ولم يذكر ‏"‏ أصحابي أصحابي ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The hadith has been narrated on the authority ot al-A'mash with the same chain of transmitters but no mention is made of: " They are my companions; they are my companions."
